document_data.name: Rauragh
document_data.title: King
document_data.mainbody: '''Rauragh''' was an [[orc]] king of [[Uruth Ukrypt]] in the mid–10{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|940}}, Rauragh attempted to amass an orc horde out of the [[Sword Mountains]] to lead them through the tunnels of the [[Underdark]] to attack [[Waterdeep]]. His plot was uncovered by the [[gold dragon]] [[Palarandusk]], who then prevented the invasion.{{Cite web|url=http://www.wizards.com/default.asp?x=dnd/wn/20031022a|title=Palarandusk, "The Unseen Protector"|author=[[Ed Greenwood]] and [[Sean K. Reynolds]]|date=2003-10-22|work=Wyrms of the North|publisher=[[Wizards of the Coast]]|accessdate=2008-01-15}}
